ValidationRule.description: If Dailout = No, then additional detail needed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", ISPICKVAL( Dial_Out__c , 'No'), ISBLANK ( User_s_Number_Dialed_From__c ), ISBLANK ( Conference_Number_Dialed__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must provide the User's Number Dialed From & Conference Number Dialed
